title: Returned Exiles and Priestly Duties
summary: This chapter lists those who returned from exile, including priests, Levites, and gatekeepers. It outlines their roles in temple service and recounts the lineage of Saul one more time, leading into the historical narrative.

faq.question: Who is listed among the returnees?
faq.answer: Priests, Levites, gatekeepers, and various families of Israel.

faq.question: Why is Saulâ€™s genealogy repeated?
faq.answer: To transition from genealogies into the story of Saul and the monarchy.
